entities.name: lavender brown
entities.description: Lavender Brown is introduced as someone who flung herself into Ron's arms. She is described as coming out of nowhere and causing a commotion.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as being hugged by Lavender Brown. He is not the main focus of this part of the text.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is introduced as someone who gives a tinkling laugh and suggests sitting down at a table. She is described as being led by Harry to a spare table.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny Weasley is mentioned as saying she would meet Dean, but sounding unenthusiastic about it. She is not the main focus of this part of the text.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as someone Ginny said she would meet. He is not described in detail.

entities.name: won-won
entities.description: Won-Won's is introduced as a place where Harry spent Christmas. It is described as being the location of some kind of event or gathering.

relationships.description: Lavender Brown hugged Ron Weasley, causing a commotion and laughter from others.
Hermione Granger visited Won-Won's with Harry during Christmas. This is implied by the context of the conversation.
